title: Fulfill Contracts
description: Visit the Contract Manager NPC, collect all contracts, and complete the quests.

title: Visit the Contract Coin Merchant
description: Exchange coins for a Mystic Key. You can also get a Precious Blessing Pouch if you're aiming for epic gear.

title: Visit the Guild Merchant
description: Purchase a Precious Polished Crystal and a Precious Base Material Selection Chest.

title: Visit the Sundries Merchant
description: Purchase all daily limited foods. You may also want to buy additional contracts.

title: Spend Dimensional Contract Token
description: Avoid hitting the dimensional token cap by completing co-op dungeons daily.

title: Spend Abyssal Contract Tokens
description: Avoid hitting the abyssal token cap by defeating mobs in abyssal areas.

title: Amitoi Expedition
description: Don't forget to send your Amitoi on an 8-hour expedition.

title: World Boss Events
description: Participate in world boss events to earn valuable items and a Special Resistance Medal.

title: (Optional) Complete Battle Pass Activities
description: Progress through daily Battle Pass tasks.

title: (Optional) Complete World Events
description: Try to complete at least 1 event per day. You can exchange 40 Special Resistance Medals for an epic item.

title: Gate of Infinity
description: Enter the Gate of Infinity and defeat the enemies.

title: Weekly Missions
description: Complete weekly missions for rewards. You can view these in the Missions menu (ESC).

title: Spend Shop Ornate Coins
description: Use Ornate Coins in the shop to purchase weekly items.

title: Weekly Guild Boss
description: Defeat at least one guild boss per week.
